Title: Bear's Kiss
Writer: Harold Manning (french adaptation), Sergei Bodrov, Carolyn Cavallero
Actors: Rebecka Liljeberg, Joachim Król, Sergey Bodrov, Keith Allen
Plot: A fairy tale-like love story between young circus artist Lola and the bear Misha, who one day transforms into a human.
Country: Germany, Sweden, Russia, Spain, France, Italy
